apierror-centralnotice-cdn-permissions-e: User does not have permission to purge front-end banner content.
apihelp-centralnoticeallocations-descrip:
Obtain the banner allocations for banners served by CentralNotice for all user types under the parametric filter.

This is a JSON only call.
apihelp-centralnoticeallocations-summary: Obtain the banner allocations for banners served by CentralNotice for all user types under the parametric filter.
apihelp-centralnoticeallocations-extende: This is a JSON only call.
apihelp-centralnoticeallocations-param-p: The project to obtain allocations under.
apihelp-centralnoticeallocations-param-a: The logged-in status to filter on (true|false).
apihelp-centralnoticeallocations-param-b: The bucket to filter on, by number (0 .. $1, optional).
apihelp-centralnoticecdncacheupdatebanne: Request the purge of banner content stored in the CDN (front-end) cache for anonymous users, for the requested banner and language
Language of the banner content to purge
Name of the banner whose content should be purged
Purge the content of 'Banner1' from CDN cache, for English
apihelp-centralnoticequerycampaign-descr: Get all configuration settings for a campaign.
apihelp-centralnoticequerycampaign-summa: Get all configuration settings for a campaign.
apihelp-centralnoticequerycampaign-param: Campaign name. Separate multiple values with a "|" (vertical bar).
apihelp-centralnoticechoicedata-descript: Get data needed to choose a banner for a given project and language
apihelp-centralnoticechoicedata-summary: Get data needed to choose a banner for a given project and language
apihelp-centralnoticechoicedata-param-pr: The project to get banner choice data for.
apihelp-centralnoticechoicedata-param-la: The language to get banner choice data for.
apihelp-centralnoticechoicedata-example-: Get the data for choosing a banner for English Wikipedia users.
apihelp-query+centralnoticelogs-descript: Get a log of campaign configuration changes.
apihelp-query+centralnoticelogs-summary: Get a log of campaign configuration changes.
apihelp-query+centralnoticelogs-param-ca: Campaign name (optional). Separate multiple values with a "|" (vertical bar).
apihelp-query+centralnoticeactivecampaig: Get a list of currently active campaigns with start and end dates and associated banners.
Get a list of currently active campaigns with start and end dates and associated banners.
Include enabled future campaigns (as well as currently active campaigns).
Get a list of currently active campaigns with start and end dates and associated banners.
